name: Will

responses.Big Footprint: Oh yes I could fit into those.
responses.Glasses: No I do not have glasses.
responses.Bag: I don't have a bag with me.
responses.Lipstick: I actually do have some Lipstick.
responses.Dark Hair: I do have dark hair yes.

noneResponses: Sorry I have some sound to render.
And why would i help you.

motives.Colin: I wanted to make a transitive relation between me, my weapon and him.
motives.Diana: She spat in my ear. I think it was an accident. But still.
motives.Lily: She once cut me in line to see Star Wars - I didn't get in!
motives.Mary: She beat me in a poetry writing contest.
motives.Mike: He once dripped molten solder on me. I still have the scar.
